languages.text: {n}Невысокий мускулистый мужчина, облаченный в алые цвета {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Духовенства Марса{/g}, заступает вам дорогу. Морщины на лбу и щеках выдают в нем человека, гневающегося часто и яростно, но сейчас он не проявляет признаков агрессии. Его кожа отливает странной синевой, и сквозь нее проступают светящиеся голубые узоры электрических татуировок — электу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Невысокий мускулистый мужчина, облаченный в алые цвета {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Духовенства Марса{/g}, заступает вам дорогу. Морщины на лбу и щеках выдают в нем человека, гневающегося часто и яростно, но сейчас он не проявляет признаков агрессии. Его кожа отливает странной синевой, и сквозь нее проступают светящиеся голубые узоры электрических татуировок — электу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}A shortish, muscular man wearing the scarlet colours of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} steps into your path. The wrinkles on his cheeks and forehead point to his propensity for frequent outbursts of fierce anger, but right now, he is showing no signs of aggression. Glowing blue patterns of electric tattoos, or electoos, show through his oddly bluish-tinted skin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Невысокий мускулистый мужчина, облаченный в алые цвета {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Духовенства Марса{/g}, заступает вам дорогу. Его кожа отливает странной синевой, и сквозь нее проступают светящиеся голубые узоры электрических татуировок — электу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein kleiner, muskulöser Mann in den roten Farben der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesterschaft des Mars{/g} stellt sich dir in den Weg. Die Falten auf seinen Wangen und seiner Stirn deuten darauf hin, dass er zu regelmäßigen, wilden Wutausbrüchen neigt. Im Moment jedoch zeigt er keinerlei Anzeichen von Aggression. Leuchtend blaue Muster elektrischer Tattoos, kurz Elektoos, schimmern durch seine eigenartig bläuliche Haut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shortish, muscular man wearing the scarlet colours of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} steps into your path. traits.locale_text: {n}Ein kleiner, muskulöser Mann in den roten Farben der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesterschaft des Mars{/g} stellt sich dir in den Weg. Die Falten auf seinen Wangen und seiner Stirn deuten darauf hin, dass er zu regelmäßigen, wilden Wutausbrüchen neigt. Im Moment jedoch zeigt er keinerlei Anzeichen von Aggression. Leuchtend blaue Muster elektrischer Tattoos, kurz Elektoos, schimmern durch seine eigenartig bläuliche Haut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un homme de petite stature et de corpulence musclée, portant les couleurs écarlates du {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}clergé de Mars{/g} s'avance devant vous. Les rides qui marquent ses joues et son front montrent qu'il est sujet à de fréquents accès de colère... mais, pour l'instant, il ne semble pas agressif. Des électrotatouages aux motifs bleus et brillants, transparaissent sur sa peau étrangement bleutée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shortish, muscular man wearing the scarlet colours of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} steps into your path. The wrinkles on his cheeks and forehead point to his propensity for frequent outbursts of fierce anger, but right now, he is showing no signs of aggression. Glowing blue patterns of electric tattoos, or electoos, show through his oddly bluish-tinted skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un homme de petite stature et de corpulence musclée, portant les couleurs écarlates du {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}clergé de Mars{/g} s'avance devant vous. Les rides qui marquent ses joues et son front montrent qu'il est sujet à de fréquents accès de colère... mais, pour l'instant, il ne semble pas agressif. Des électrotatouages aux motifs bleus et brillants, transparaissent sur sa peau étrangement bleutée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一个身材稍矮但肌肉发达的男人，穿着代表{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星祭司{/g}的猩红长袍，拦住了你的去路。他的脸颊和额头上满是皱纹，看起来应该是个暴脾气，但他此刻并没有动手的意图。他古怪的蓝色皮肤纹着发光的蓝色图案，看起来像是某种电子纹身或是电镀体。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shortish, muscular man wearing the scarlet colours of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} steps into your path. The wrinkles on his cheeks and forehead point to his propensity for frequent outbursts of fierce anger, but right now, he is showing no signs of aggression. Glowing blue patterns of electric tattoos, or electoos, show through his oddly bluish-tinted skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一个身材稍矮但肌肉发达的男人，穿着代表{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星祭司{/g}的猩红长袍，拦住了你的去路。他的脸颊和额头上满是皱纹，看起来应该是个暴脾气，但他此刻并没有动手的意图。他古怪的蓝色皮肤纹着发光的蓝色图案，看起来像是某种电子纹身或是电镀体。{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星の神官団{/g}の緋色の服を着た背の低い筋肉質の男が、目の前に立ちはだかる。男の頬と額のシワを見れば、頻繁に激しい怒りを爆発させる人物だと予想できるが、今は攻撃的な態度は見られない。電気タトゥー、またの名を『エレクトゥー』の青く輝く模様が、男の妙に青みがかった肌を通して見えている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shortish, muscular man wearing the scarlet colours of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} steps into your path. The wrinkles on his cheeks and forehead point to his propensity for frequent outbursts of fierce anger, but right now, he is showing no signs of aggression. Glowing blue patterns of electric tattoos, or electoos, show through his oddly bluish-tinted skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}火星の神官団{/g}の緋色の服を着た背の低い筋肉質の男が、目の前に立ちはだかる。男の頬と額のシワは見れば、よく激しい怒りを爆発させる人物だと予想できるが、今は攻撃的な態度は見られない。電気タトゥー、またの名を『エレクトゥー』の青く輝く模様が、男の妙に青みがかった肌を通して見えている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un hombre bajito y musculoso que viste los colores escarlata del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Sacerdocio de Marte{/g} se cruza en tu camino. Las arrugas de sus mejillas y su frente denotan su propensión a frecuentes arrebatos de ira feroz, pero ahora mismo no muestra signos de agresividad. A través de su extraña piel azulada se ven brillantes dibujos azules de tatuajes eléctricos, o electoos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shortish, muscular man wearing the scarlet colours of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} steps into your path. The wrinkles on his cheeks and forehead point to his propensity for frequent outbursts of fierce anger, but right now, he is showing no signs of aggression. Glowing blue patterns of electric tattoos, or electoos, show through his oddly bluish-tinted skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre bajito y musculoso que viste los colores escarlata del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Sacerdocio de Marte{/g} se cruza en tu camino. Las arrugas de sus mejillas y su frente denotan su propensión a frecuentes arrebatos de ira feroz, pero ahora mismo no muestra signos de agresividad. A través de su extraña piel azulada se ven brillantes dibujos azules de tatuajes eléctricos, o electoos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mars Rahipliği'nin{/g} kan kızılı giysilerini giyen, nispeten kısa boylu, yapılı bir adam önünü kesiyor. Yanakları ve alnındaki kırışıklar sıklıkla vahşi öfke nöbetlerine girme eğiliminde olduğunu işaret etse de şu anda herhangi bir saldırganlık emaresi göstermiyor. Mavinin tuhaf bir tonundaki teninde elektrikli dövmelerin, yani elektrodövmelerin mavi desenleri parıldıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A shortish, muscular man wearing the scarlet colours of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Priesthood of Mars{/g} steps into your path. The wrinkles on his cheeks and forehead point to his propensity for frequent outbursts of fierce anger, but right now, he is showing no signs of aggression. Glowing blue patterns of electric tattoos, or electoos, show through his oddly bluish-tinted skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Mars Rahipliği{/g}'nin kızıl renkli giysilerini giyen, nispeten kısa boylu, yapılı bir adam önüne çıkıyor. Yanakları ve alnındaki kırışıklar sıklıkla öfke nöbetlerine girme eğiliminde olduğuna işaret etse de şu anda herhangi bir saldırganlık emaresi göstermiyor. Mavinin tuhaf bir tonundaki teninde elektrik dövmelerin, yani elektrodövmelerin mavi desenleri parıldıyor.{/n}
